// src/components/Help.js import React from "react"; import "./Help.css"; const Help = () => { return (

Help & Support

How can we assist you today?

üì± How to Place an Order

  1. Select your table number from the home page
  2. Browse the menu and click "Add to Cart" for desired items
  3. Review your order in the cart summary
  4. Click "Place Order" to submit your order to the kitchen

‚ùì Frequently Asked Questions

Can I modify my order after placing it?

Orders cannot be modified once placed. Please contact staff for assistance.

How long does food preparation take?

Preparation time varies by dish. Estimated times are shown on the menu.

What if I have dietary restrictions?

Please inform our staff about any dietary requirements before ordering.

üìû Contact Support

Phone: +1 (555) 123-HELP

Email: support@hotelmanagement.com

Hours: 8:00 AM - 10:00 PM Daily

); }; export default Help;
